channel.title: I need help with ipban CMON Y WONT NOONE HELP :(
channel.description:
ok so i finally got rid of that error so when i compile it says compile succesful but now........................ everytime i ipban the person logs in after 1 min and im like how do u keep logging in and he says i just keep cliking for about 1 min and i log in someone please help me
so technely i dont ip ban i just kik for 1 min...... :( :( :( :mad: :mad: :mad: :confused: :confused:

item.title: I need help with ipban CMON Y WONT NOONE HELP :(
item.dc:creator: @ingo345 ingo345
item.description:
@ingo345 wrote:

umm yea it says

this error

client.java:10612 cannot find symbol
symbol : method appendtobannedips(java.lang.string)
location: class client
appendtobannedips(v.connectedfrom);
^

(the ^ is pointing on a)< not part of error please help!!!

[quote=“tonypker13, post:4, topic:247610”][code]
if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“tonypker13”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IPED THE DOUCH BAG HOMO: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }

[/code][/quote]

item.title: I need help with ipban CMON Y WONT NOONE HELP :(
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

        if (command.startsWith("ipban")
                && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("tonypker13"))) {
            String victim = command.substring(6);
            int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
            client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

            appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
            v.disconnected = true;
            sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                    + ": HAS IPED THE DOUCH BAG HOMO: " + command.substring(5);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                    }
                }
            }
        }

Read full topic
